description.author: Csaba Hruska, Péter Diviánszky, Dániel Pék, Andor Pénzes
description.synopsis: LambdaCube 3D is a DSL to program GPUs
description.description:
LambdaCube 3D is a domain specific language and library that makes it
possible to program GPUs in a purely functional style.

package-flags.name: alltest
package-flags.description: Additionally compiles the testsuite, unit tests, backend test server, performance report (useful for development)
